content.value:
It is endlessly exhausting that a clear call out type post from marginalized folk ALWAYS has a mountain of replies from cis white men trying to find exceptions, excuses, or praise.

Shut the fuck up for once in your life. Just don't reply.
content.html: It is endlessly exhausting that a clear call out type post from marginalized folk ALWAYS has a mountain of replies from cis white men trying to find exceptions, excuses, or praise. Shut the fuck up for once in your life. Just don't reply.
